definition: Tse Ting-Fung or Nicholas Tse (1980-), Cantopop star
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
surname Xie
clap of thunder
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)

sentences.english: Ann: I just said the title of this article. Do you know Cecilia Cheung and Nicholas Tse?
sentences.chinese: 我在说这片文章的题目，你知道张柏芝和谢霆锋吧？

sentences.english: The report revealed that Nicholas Tse was accompanying Cheung from the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 报道还透露，谢霆锋在一开始就一直陪伴着张柏芝。

sentences.english: Ann: How many children is Cecilia Cheung willing to have for Nicholas Tse?
sentences.chinese: 张柏芝愿意为谢霆锋生几个孩子呢？

sentences.english: I saw online that Nicholas Tse will divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我看网上说谢霆锋要跟她离婚呢。

sentences.english: While in private dinner, Nicholas Tse in good spirits, breath easy and talk straight.
sentences.chinese: 而在包房吃饭时，谢霆锋情绪不错，谈笑自如。

sentences.english: Singer Nicholas Tse Ting-fung and model Cheung Pak-chi are the teen idols of the moment.
sentences.chinese: 时下青少年偶像有歌星谢霆锋和模特儿张柏芝。

sentences.english: Did you watch the news today Nicholas Tse was bailed out of jail earlier today.
sentences.chinese: 你有看今天的新闻吗谢霆锋今天稍早被保释出狱了。

sentences.english: I compare in the eyes of husband and wife is famous star Cecilia Cheung and Nicholas Tse.
sentences.chinese: 在我眼中比较出名的明星夫妻就是张柏芝和谢霆锋。
